name: RPRS GAMING, L.P., as a Limited Partner in and Derivatively on Behalf of HSP Gaming, L.P., Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA GAMING CONTROL BOARD and HSP Gaming, L.P., Appellees Tower Entertainment, LLC, Intervenor-Appellee
name_abbreviation: RPRS GAMING, L.P. v. Pennsylvania Gaming Control Board

judges: Justice STEVENS did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: RPRS GAMING, L.P., as a Limited Partner in and Derivatively on Behalf of HSP Gaming, L.P., Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA GAMING CONTROL BOARD and HSP Gaming, L.P., Appellees Tower Entertainment, LLC, Intervenor-Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of March, 2015, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice STEVENS did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Richard A. Sprague, Thomas A. Sprague, Joseph R. Podra-za, Sprague & Sprague, Philadelphia, for Appellant.

Robert C. Heim, Michael Scott Doluisio, Dechert LLP, Philadelphia, Raymond Adam Quaglia, Michael David Matthews Fabius, S. Clifford Sacalis, Ballard Spahr LLP, Philadelphia, Richard Douglas Sherman, Stephen S. Cook, David Cornelius Hittinger, Jr., PA Gaming Control Bd., Harrisburg, for Appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
111 A.3d 746
RPRS GAMING, L.P., as a Limited Partner in and Derivatively on Behalf of HSP Gaming, L.P., Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA GAMING CONTROL BOARD and HSP Gaming, L.P., Appellees Tower Entertainment, LLC, Intervenor-Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 25, 2015.
Richard A. Sprague, Thomas A. Sprague, Joseph R. Podra-za, Sprague & Sprague, Philadelphia, for Appellant.
Robert C. Heim, Michael Scott Doluisio, Dechert LLP, Philadelphia, Raymond Adam Quaglia, Michael David Matthews Fabius, S. Clifford Sacalis, Ballard Spahr LLP, Philadelphia, Richard Douglas Sherman, Stephen S. Cook, David Cornelius Hittinger, Jr., PA Gaming Control Bd., Harrisburg, for Appellees.
